welcome_message_body: "Welcome to West Point, a charming city nestled on the banks of the Hudson River! Known for its rich history, beautiful scenery, and vibrant community, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a wonderful stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Municipal Airport serves as the primary hub for all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Municipal Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments, providing efficient and secure transportation services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Municipal Airport caters to private and corporate aircraft, offering exclusive services and amenities for a luxurious travel experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
Free WiFi is available throughout the airport

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brigham City Airport serves domestic flights to various destinations.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Brigham City Airport provides services for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
